name: Return to Frogge
description:
Women want you. Frogs want to be you. You want to be a frog. About:

This bullet hell was made for an internal company game jam as a way for us all to say goodbye to the studio (we ran out of funding RIP)

Theme: Reversal

We reversed the story "The Frog Prince" but also when you get shot the bullets reverse! Double reversal!

Credits:
  • pink doodlr - character art & animation
  • Chris Knowles- game design
  • Jashon (Shonny) -programming
  • Scott Thomson - technical art & programming
  • Gareth - The Ayshe - programming
  • Josh Grant - frog irl
  • Sara Ransley - environmental art
  • Arlena Hosking (aydaze.art) - projectile animation
  • Lauryn Dorne - UI & branding
